Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: Cells were continuously grown in RPMI with 10% FBS, split when they reached a density of 1-2x10e6 cells/ml down to 5x10e5 cells/ml
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: cells were washed with PBS and lysed with 0.1% IGEPAL CA-630, followed by Tn5 transposase treatment, Libraries were made using the Nextera DNA library prep kit (Illumina)
Sample_data_processing: Alignment to the genome (Bowtie) maintaining strict read order, Trim_galore (to remove sequencing adaptors), FLASH (to reconstruct paired end reads into single reads where possible), Removal of PCR duplicates, parsing of informative reads using samtools rmdup, Peak calling using Homer
Sample_contact_department: MRC Weatherall Institute of Molecular Medicine
cell type: Paediatric monocytic cell line derived from AML M5 with t(9;11)(q21;q23) translocation

Sample_title: ATAC-seq in MLL-AF4 ALL patient blasts

sample_name: ATAC-seq in MLL-AF4 ALL patient blasts
